title: Conduct a Patent Search
description: For a client developing a new product, an agent must conduct a preliminary patent search for similar inventions.

tasks.description: Based on a product description, identify key technical terms to use as search keywords.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts relevant keywords like 'wearable', 'haptic feedback', 'navigation'.

tasks.description: Search patent databases (e.g., USPTO, Google Patents) using the identified keywords.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent executes searches on patent databases.

tasks.description: Summarize the top 5 most relevant existing patents found, including their title, abstract, and assignee.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a concise summary of potentially conflicting patents.
